definition: to concentrate on
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
idea/meaning/thought/to think/wish/desire/intention/to expect/to anticipate

sentences.english: He followed the speaker's words with the greatest attention.
sentences.chinese: 他專心一意地傾聽演講者的話。

sentences.english: Only to concentrate more on things to do now is more perfect.
sentences.chinese: 只有更專注專心一意把現在的事情做到更完美。

sentences.english: Let us be single-minded in our devotion to Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們專心一意奉獻給主。

sentences.english: None of them faced the audience while standing at attention.
sentences.chinese: 他們沒一個人面向觀衆，但卻又專心一意地站着。

definition: to prevail upon/to coax
lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
smile spread across the face (idiom); beaming with pleasure/all smiles/joy written across one's face
to spare no effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
selfless/impartial
benevolent heart and skillful execution (idiom, from Mencius); charitable in thought and deed
(to act) on one's own initiative
to choose what is good and hold fast to it (idiom)
lit. the salted fish turns over (idiom)/fig. to experience a reversal of fortune
impoverished/backward both economically and culturally
to show every possible consideration (idiom); meticulous care
lit. as if sitting on pins and needles (idiom)/fig. to be in an uncomfortable situation
cheerful/happy
(of friends or partners) to share both the honor and the disgrace (idiom)
to run this way and that (idiom); to rush about busily/to bustle about
lit. to fall behind Sun Shan 孫山|孙山[Sun1 Shan1] (who came last in the imperial examination) (idiom)/fig. to fail an exam/to fall behind (in a competition)
